experience: You and Rachel both know Tony Ardizzone, 'Stephan Brewer, CPA, CTRS, JSM Tax, and 4 others
You both work in the same area
You and Rachel both currently work in Scottsdale, Arizona

Ms. Saxelby coordinates and participates in all facets of the review and preparation of real estate purchase and sale agreements and related transaction documents for multifamily, condominiums, office, industrial, retail, land and development transactions, as well as the review and negotiation of real estate finance documents, including the preparation of lender required legal opinions, and associated entity documents. Ms. Saxelby manages all aspects of complex acquisitions, dispositions and financing transactions from inception to closing, and also assists in the review of title documents, surveys and other property and transaction related due diligence.Prior to joining Grafitti Rosensteel & Hall, LLC, Ms. Saxelby served as an Assistant Vice President of Capital Markets for a national commercial real estate financing company where she was responsible for underwriting all commercial real estate asset types, sourcing financing and handling all facets of the closing process on a national basis. She has closed approximately $1B in total loan and transaction volume and has deep and broad experience with the underwriting criteria, loan terms, closing processes and lender requirements for various debt and equity sources, including agency (FannieMae and FreddieMac), CMBS, life company, bank balance-sheet and bridge. Prior to her Capital Markets career, Ms. Saxelby served in marketing and transaction management for a multifamily investment brokerage sales team where she was responsible for preparing marketing packages, assisting clients in property level due diligence and managing the full transaction closing process. Ms. Saxelby has over 11 years of commercial real estate experience.

Walker & Dunlop is a leading multifamily and commercial real estate lender that offers a comprehensive suite of financing solutions and continues to introduce innovative products to the market. Our team's focus is on sourcing debt and equity for clients nationwide through various capital sources, including Walker & Dunlop's proprietary loan products. We work with our clients to provide customized financing and unparalleled customer service through our team approach. Our suite of options including Fannie Mae DUS®, Freddie Mac Program Plus®, HUD, Life Co, CMBS and bridge executions, enables us to structure customized financing for your particular project. With more than 400 employees in 21 offices nationwide, Walker & Dunlop has the national reach, local expertise, long-standing relationships and industry experience to make your deal successful.

I would recommend Mary Ann to anyone who is looking to hire a team player and a hard worker.
